title: British Man Suing AstraZeneca. Claims His TV Host Wife Died Because of Covid Vaccine

opengraph.description:
Although rare, deaths as a result of the Covid vaccine do occur, and it appears both governments and pharmaceutical companies go through great pains to avoid admitting the fatalities. When compensation is sought by victims, it seems there are hurdles set by both Big Pharma and governments. In the United Kingdom, many claimants have secured medical certificates confirming the COVID-19 vaccine culprit responsible for the death of a family member. Yet reports say many family members wait for nearly a year despite the fact the government has claimed the average turnaround duration for successful claimants should take “around six months.” Now, a new case may bring more attention to the British government.
Widower of TV personality sues AstraZeneca
